Reviews.Title: “Comfortable and well priced”
Reviews.Author: DublinCityCruiser
Reviews.Content: decided stay tulip hotel offering special rate reasonable usual hotel choice comfortable spacious appliances shower plenty hot water booking easy checkin slow disorganized unusual bur dubai hotels reception wakeup call morning forgot wake morning hotels bur dubai corridors tiled result noisy hotel located quiet street little street noise drawback walk main street taxi fun hauling luggage hotel inexpensive offers comfortable midrange accommodation delivered exactly promised website

Reviews.Title: “Good Deal - Great location”
Reviews.Author: Ericsosa
Reviews.Content: live abu dhabi dubai weekend hotel location feel deal considering stayed hotels payed clean weird smell cleaning products hated free internet lobby day age booked staff knowledgeable hotel recommend friends stay hotel desert safari trip loved trip

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Hotel”
Reviews.Author: rajiv_kathnep
Reviews.Content: 5 little children enjoyed apartment friendly staff spacious kitchen amneties swimming pool aircon breakfast basic stay 7 days children comfortable highly recommend

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Kinshasa, Democratic Republic of the Congo
Reviews.Title: “One of the best options in the hotel-apartment district”
Reviews.Author: zamb1
Reviews.Content: extremely clean comfortable apartment lovely rooftop pool steamsauna facilities staff little slow 5 times repair tv apartments drove ages looking easiest landmark 24 spinneys al road sheet smelt chlorine crockery etc bit lacking im pick facilities service nearby golden sands
